name: Telaba's Builder
description:
Click one of the resource icons in the bottom left to start building.

You can move with WASD or middle mouse + drag, zoom with scroll and rotate with Q/E or right click + drag.

Different resources can be placed in different locations. Experiment to find out what works for you.

There's no real gameplay other than placing blocks using a menu. I would have liked some resource management to be added to make it fit in a city builder kind of style title. I would also have liked to add more building options.

Sorry for the lame arrogant title :D,  I couldn't think of anything else on time. Kind of the same for most of this jam. This is in no ways what I set out to make and feels below my standards, but I think it's good to upload anyway. I wish I had more time!
